overview: At the very tip of the boot that is Italy lies an olive grove. Here, a rich old lady who is almost 100 years old shares her luxurious villa from the 1970s with her large family. It is a voluminous world full of animals, people and antiques: the raw material of reality in all its chaotic might, which in 'The Garden of Calabria' speaks the language of the senses.
title: The Garden of Calabria
